title: סימולציית פלאש קארד - אוצר מילים
description: 120 שאלות פלאש קארד לאוצר מילים באנגלית - תרגום מעברית לאנגלית

questions.question: What is the best translation of 'able'?
questions.explanation: The word 'able' means capable or having the ability to do something. In Hebrew: מסוגל.

questions.question: What is the best translation of 'accept'?
questions.explanation: The word 'accept' means to receive willingly or to agree to. In Hebrew: לקבל.

questions.question: What is the best translation of 'add'?
questions.explanation: The word 'add' means to put together or include. In Hebrew: להוסיף.
